name: HashHelix Singularity v0
description: A non-deterministic, temporally unbound proto-singularity. This object represents the pre-initialized core state from which deterministic recursion may later emerge. It contains no π/n phase logic, no lineage anchoring, and no temporal binding.

lineage.notes: This object precedes all recursive structures but is not part of the temporal lineage tree.

metadata.creator: James Bradley Waresback — The Mandolinian
metadata.notes: Serves as the raw computational embryo before the HashHelix π/n engine is introduced.
